thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 5 of 279
thread.title: Sharon G.
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Sharon G.

author: Sharon G.
title: Sharon G.
text:
During the process I was greatly pleased to work with and receive great service from all the Quicken Loan rep's who assisted with my refinance.
I was especially appreciative of both Bobbie Graves and Tori Carey. Both, were highly professional, efficient and took great care, through the entire process. Both being very clear, patient, and made sure none of my questions went unanswered. I was fully able to trust that my loan processed quickly with attention to all details. THANKS
